note: Classics Prof at flagship university in Greg Abbott’s state. Author of Disciplining Christians. Augustine. Write a lot about Latin Epistolography, esp Late Antique. Working on Cyprian and Roman African cultural history. Chronic illness turned me into an advocate for Disability. Severely immunocompromised.

fields.name: Non-Academic Interests
fields.value: Cats, politics, random smart people and ideas

fields.name: Severely Immunocompromised
fields.value: Not a fan of people who don’t believe in science and indulge in conspiracy theories
